Content: 21 YEARS OF HIRU; 21 MILLIONAIRES IN 21 DAYS”  - HIRU VISITS THE HOME OF THE 17 TH MILLIONAIRE WITH THE GIFT The giving away of the largest cash prize in the history of Sri Lankan television of 21 million rupees to celebrate 21 years of Hiru, “21 millionaires in 21 days” programme commenced on the 10 th . Hiru is ready to make a millionaire every day. G.M. Nilakshi Amerasinghe from Kotikawatte became the 17 th millionaire yesterday. You have an opportunity to be a millionaire by watching the Hiru Tele procession from 7.30-9.55 pm from Monday to Friday.
